name: NEPTUNE AVIATION
sampleDescriptions: Provide educational services to Members of Congress and Administration officials on nature of aerial firefighting and to assist in improved contracting vehicles for client.
Provide educational services to Members of Congress and Administration officials on nature of aerial firefighting and to assist in improved contracting vehicles for client.

S. 902, Wildfire Response and Preparedness Act of 2025; FY26 Interior & Environment Appropriations; H.R. 3300, Forest Protection and Wildland Firefighter Safety Act of 2025; S. 1672, Forest Protection
